She looked at the damage to her tail, then back to you. Her eyes were glossy and unfocused, her expression was blank, and she looks as if she’s about to pass out. Poor thing, between her hangover, a long hot walk at noon in the sun, no food and the shock to her system she’s having a rough day. She starts repeating “Almost back to the room, just a little further.” You don’t know if she’s talking to you or using the last of her strength to make it. Concern for her well being and yours forced a question up your throat, “Hey, Lucette, are you gonna be alright?” She’s weak but rigid, “Yea…I think so, I’m getting really dizzy. Lemme give you this, it’s too…” trailing off. With one hand clamped on a railing, she leans over and gives you the key to the cage. Too much? It weighs ounces, maybe she means too much to carry.

The elevator lurches, stops and opens. Outside a family of jaguars were waiting for the elevator. They were treated to the view right up the dress of Lucette as she was leaning over. The father figure and one of the girls grinned awkwardly, the mother figure covered the eyes of the remaining girl. The mortified matriarch urgently tries to address the situation, “Wow, um, we’ll catch the next one. Do something about this Percy! PERCY!” She slapped then slapped the shoulder of the father figure, “PERCY!” He broke his trance and returned to the moment, “What? Oh! What do you expect me to do? There’s no, ‘butt cheetah send on’ I mean, no ‘on cheeta butt send’, damnit I mean, ‘send cheetah on button’ out here.” She slaps him upside the head, “Really? Your children are right here. Right kids?” The girl with the hand over her eyes adds to the dialogue, ”I don’t see what either of you are talking about. My vision is spotty.” The other girl seeing a moment to inject some sass weighed in as kids do, “I’m with dad on this one mom. I’m pretty happy right here.” The mom throws her hands up, “Oh haha, very funny.” The elevator doors closed and the oldest kid’s eyes looked at you hungrily. Normally her gaze would cause you concern but at the moment you were looking at Lucette, she was struggling to stand back up. The elevator rocked as it resumed it’s ascent. Weakly she tried to communicate something but after incomprehensible syllables exited her lips she collapsed, rolling off your cage onto her back and swiftly out of consciousness.

Urgently you being trying to work the key into the lock to get out to check on her. “Lucette? Can you hear me?” Your attention is on the lock but you keep talking to her trying to bring her back every way you can. “Lucette, babe, you gotta wake up so we can get to the room. Cammon Lucette! You don’t want to be that girl found passed out in an elevator.” Outside the flattened cat does not respond. The key is equally unhelpful. Eventually in frustration you shout her name at the top of your lungs. Right as the elevator door opens, you didn’t even know it had stopped. This is the 17th floor, down the hallway is her room, somewhere. The doors are open and the hallway awaits but you can’t leave Lucette like this, even if you had a choice. Outside in the hall you can see a shadow move, but with the lighting out there you cannot decide if it’s one person or many. From the footfalls it sounds like many. You hope against hope that whatever comes is going to be kind. Moments later what you heard approaching appears and is a trio of teenagers. A maybe bearish boy, a racoon girl, and another boy looking like an ox. They must have heard you and came to investigate. Teenagers, great, not what you were hoping for. Well you are about to find out if they are good teens or bad. By their attire and attitude, a sinking feeling twisted your stomach into a massive knot.
1111111212221122112.title: The elevator makes stops on the way to the 17th

choices: The Minotaur collects you and Lucette for himself
11111112122211221121.content:
The racoon girl looked down on the passed out cat, “Whoa, club candy is out cold.” The two boys advanced and she took a picture of the sight on her phone. The ox reached for her purse and started to fumble with the clasp. The bearboy however poked her face to see if she was close to waking. Your heart sank when her head bounced away from repeated pokes. This was unacceptable, the parallels between humans and furs were all too strong and this behavior filled you with a kind of focus and rage that supersede your diminished frame. For moments you mull over the potential dangers of attracting their attention, to hell with it, Lucette is the closest thing you have to a friend right now. The girl stood in the doorway keeping the elevator from departing, leaning against it’s side in amusement. The ox was pilfering her purse taking all the valuables he could find, and the bear had loosened the strings on her dress and reached between them to feel her breasts. Wholly unacceptable, but from your cage you can’t do anything.

You can’t do anything. But someone passing by could. Never before in your life have you considered calling for help, either too proud or not desperate enough, maybe even because that would acknowledge that you were in a situation that you cannot handle on your own. You take a deep breath to scream for help, wishing there was anything else you could do. You try to exhale but it doesn’t work. Another breath for a scream, and you squeeze air out more quickly. Another breath and you scream as loud as you have ever made noise before in your life, you see stars and your throat feels like it’s being torn apart by sandpaper. Your loathing of this moment bolsters your resolve to be heard by someone and you squeeze more volume from deep down inside. “Heeelp! Someone! Anyone! We need help! Please someone help!”

All three of the teenagers jump in unison, either not having noticed you or simply by the volume of your call. They wait a moment for you to stop howling. The girl stays by the door bemused, “Whoa, the runty bitch has some pipes on her, anyone else’s ears ringing?” The ox with the purse had dropped it and after looking you indifferently up and down continues pilfering it’s contents. The bear’s lust appears to have lined you up next for his attentions. First he tears Lucette’s dress wide open to expose her spotted tits, “Get a load of these, they are perfect.” Coldly the girl raises her phone and snaps another photo. “Better than mine? Careful how you respond bud.” He leaned over and started licking Lucette’s exposed chest, “Hey, that’s not fair, how can I compare what you have to these knockers?” The racoon didn’t respond. “Babe?”

The racoon was suddenly much taller than the boys, not taller, higher. She made a creaking sound that attempted to recover the boy’s attentions. “Guys…gaa uuyss!” Around her neck were massive fingers that hers’ couldn’t pry off. Standing behind her and holding her aloft with a single arm was a massive midnight black minotaur wearing an equally dark suit. The gold thread matched his jewelry and nose ring. The boys froze. A powerful and low voice rumbled up from somewhere in that suit. “That is no way to assist a lady.” The bear stood up immediately and squared off with the newcomer. “Lady? This is some piece of party trash that passed out –“ he had begun to point at Lucette and pick his next insult, couldn’t, and then turned to look down at her for more ammunition. The moment his eyes were off the minotaur a colossal booted foot blurred off the floor and kicked him square in the side through the bear’s arm. This sent the adolescent against the side of the elevator hard enough to rock the car. He slid down clutching his arm and side together. So surprised he didn’t offer any smart ass retort. Bovine eyes fixed on the ox, followed by the voice that sounded like it echoed from the end of the universe “Return the lady’s valuables boy.” He obeyed, only returning the cash. Do you point this out to the goliath? Could he be a bigger danger than some pervy teenage thugs? Obviously he has no issue being violent, and if his poise is an example, he will have little regard for any challenge you and Lucette could offer. He was still for a moment, “I see you have damaged the lady’s dress. How about you make amends, put your wallets and phones in her purse.” The boys hesitated, then he shook the girl, she tried to croak some instructions and then tossed her phone to Lucette’s purse and pulled a small studded walled from her vest and did the same. Apparently following their leader the boys did the same. “Not very good, I said in her purse, not on.” The ox scrambled to follow the instructions.

The tower of muscle took a heavy step into the elevator and retrieved your cage and placed it outside the door. Firmly he placed the girl down on her feet and went back to retrieve Lucette. Anxiously you watch as he picks her up. The ox takes a swing at him. It hits him right in the side of the face. It does precisely nothing. The ox realizes the height of his folly too late and the minotaur moves his whole body like rolling boulder and slaps the boy against the far wall. Sending him dazed to the ground. The girl assumes a defensive posture but makes sure to stay as far away as she can from the midnight titan. “The fuck was that mister?” Lucette is now in his arms as he turns and walks out, not concerned about any attack from the remaining teenager. “That was as you kids say, a bitch slap.” She stood over her dazed cohorts, “The hell it was, you sent him flying!” He turned around and in an amused voice responded, “It was indeed a bitch slap. I slapped him, and he took it like a bitch. Now give me your vest miss.” She stood with her mouth open, you were unsure if it was in regard of the comment. “Do I need to issue another bitch slap in this elevator?” She silently yanked off her vest and threw it at him. He exited the elevator and let it resume it’s journey.
11111112122211221121.title: These teenagers are interested in Lucettte

choices: Lucette's friend returns to find you caged on the floor
The four o'clock steak comes knocking
111111121222112211212.content:
Your chest unclenched, once the doors shut. You’ve worn corsets before, and played with a tightness to see what it was like to pass out and then aborted at the last moment. This was much the same. You two were safe from the teenagers. At some point you realize you sat down in the cage, still clutching the key and somehow have managed to keep your fabric towel dress thing in the same place. Now is this minotaur the flame under a frying pan? You silently hope not, the ease he handled those teenagers makes him a spectacularly intimidating slab of muscle. Your concerns fade quickly as he turns and takes a knee so you can see Lucette better, he had just finished tucking the girl’s vest around her exposed chest before he spoke to you. “Forgive my bluntness miss, did they hurt her or you in any way?” His voice was deep, like a bass speaker. You respond finding your voice horse and scratchy from your calls for help, “Na-no. No, she passed out in the elevator and they found her. The bear boy thing undid her dress and felt her up, that’s all they did to her.” He turned his head away and asked an unseen party if they heard what you said. You listen for a person you’ve completely failed to realize is there and to your surprise you find her.

Sitting hidden behind a planter is a woman in a cage similar to yours with phone leaning against the inside bars, “Yes master, just a sec.” She continues talking into the phone, you can’t exactly hear what she’s saying from here, a moment later you hear the phone’s end of call chime. She turned to her…master and with great relief informed him that security is waiting for the teens at the elevator in the lobby.

His attention returned to you, “I assume that was you I heard. That was a very brave thing you did little one.” You still haven’t stood back up, either the scream or nerves having taken more than their fair share of your energy, “Well she is my friend, or I think she’s my friend, even if she isn’t what they were doing was entirely vile.” His hand stretched out and brought the other caged woman next to you. Your eyes stay on Lucette hoping to see signs of her waking up. “So what has caused your friend to pass out in the elevator?” You have no desire to expose her hungover state but there is no alternative, “I think she partied too hard last night.” Calmly he makes a comment about how he understood from his party days, it was a comforting tale that was probably designed to calm and might be embellished. Finally he introduced himself, “Well brave one, I’m Mr. Bowman, what are your names?” He was significantly the most polite person you’ve met to date, “My name is Shannon, my friend here is Lucette.” He repeats your name slowly, asking for your last name. “Oh, Shannon Larrity.” He looks you in the eye, more like a peer than anything else, “Well Miss Larrity, it’s a pleasure to make your acquaintance. Do you know Lucette’s last name?” Much to your embarrassment you don’t, but when would you have learned it anyway? “I’m afraid I do not we’ve just met.” The woman in the cage next to yours politely adds her analysis, “Excuse me master, the tip of her tail seems to be hurt.” Instantly his eyes find the damage and his demeanor becomes slightly more serious, “Is this injury from a different event miss?” Your annoyance about the cage returns swiftly without anything more serious to distract you from it, “Yes, the woman who locked me in here shut her tail in the door and didn’t get it out quickly.” The woman honked a stifled laugh out, “Lemme guess, a leopard behind the front desk?” You nod. The minotaur snorts angrily. “Miss Larrity, this is my prized property Miss Eva. Miss Eva, this is the brave Shannon Larrity.” The woman waves at you with a genuine excitement to meet another shrunken woman in the same situation.

“Your friend here needs her rest. If you will allow me I will take you both to your room.” To your surprise you remember the room number through the events of the last few minutes, you don’t recall making a note of it. “Our room is 1713, it would be great.” He has unlocked the woman’s cage, “By all means. Miss, Eva would you mind finding their room key please?” Hurriedly she has already plunged head first into Lucette’s purse, “Of course master.” Extremely long legs remained outside the purse as she rooted around. The both of you sit in silence for a moment before she exits the purse with the room key. “I’ve found it master.” She hands it to him and returns to her cage.

“Thank you, now can you help me get our neighbors to their room?” She pauses a moment and stretches her legs and hips, then her upper body and arms. “Of course master.” She has the build of an Olympian, muscular, feminine, tall, golden hair, and a light blue toga to complete the look. It’s see through showing off more of her body, and doing precisely nothing to hide the large golden nipple rings. With a bit of envy you notice she’s not wearing the lion’s head between her legs, but has a third golden ring piercing there too. With little effort she approaches and grips your cage and as the minotaur stands back up, to a near titanic height, she drags you nearly effortlessly behind him.

Unsure just what social etiquette is appropriate you blurt out, “Hi?” Eva responds with a shockingly little amount of strain in her voice. “Hey there, how are you doing? That was quite the scare.” That was more relaxed than you expected. “I think I’m ok for now, how about you?” She continued dragging your cage down the hallway easily, “Oh you know, I’m eighteen inches tall, so…my aspirations for the day are….low.” You chuckle with that terrible pun, you hope she’s not completely miserable behind the humor. “So have you been at this place long? I just go here three days ago.” She shot you an apologetic look, “Lemme guess, they had you collared shrunk pretty fast didn’t they?” With some annoyance you flick the loop on your collar, “Yep, apparently I’ve made some mistakes, you?” She grins with some regret, “Same.” Her collar was infinitely more ornate than yours, not just a gold band twisted into a hinged loop, hers was what looked like guided lace, covering a considerable bruise. You point to her neck, “That’s a fancy collar, did he do that to you?” She strains for a moment dragging you over the change of flooring leading into 1713, “Yea, it’s pretty isn’t it? He had it ready when bought me out of the Ty-ups shop. I thought I was gonna get out at the end of the day, but apparently at the end of the day, if you are human their option to buy you permanently comes up before your option to be released or go for another day.” Well that’s terrifying news, “I’ll make a note to never try that, I meant what happened to your neck” Her tone changed from amusement to dislike, “Oh that, that was the spotted bitch behind the front desk.” The same woman? “Do you mean that leopard woman?” Eva chuckles, “Yea, if she’s still down there with my master gets there, there will be hell to pay.”

Together all of you have stopped outside 1713. Mr. Bowman points to the door next down the hall and informs you that they are in 1714. With no effort he opens the door and holds it for you two ladies before entering. He carefully follows making sure not to bump Lucette or Eva’s empty cage. Seeing an 8 foot tall mythical creature move silently is just one more surreal thing you didn’t think you’d see. With a pang of unease you watch him carry her into the bedroom, but your faith is rewarded when he returns a moment later and goes to the kitchen to retrieve a towel wrapped ice pack and glass of water to put in her room. Eva patiently leans on the bars of your cage but at their farthest point, trying not to alienate you. Once you relax for a moment your mind digests your situation some. For the first time you have the chance to talk to another woman, a human woman, about this trap you’ve wandered into. Just as you open your mouth to start the first question of a barrage piling up in your mind. Mr. Bowman returns to the living room and snaps his fingers pointing to the empty cage. Eva stood up and immediately began walking back to hers, “Wait! Eva! I have so many questions!” The colossus walked past you and closed the blinds. Eva shouted back from across the room, “If our owners get together to talk I’m sure I’ll be able to give you some answers ok?” As he walked back he took a knee and looked you in the eye, “If you need anything Miss Larrity, please don’t hesitate to call. We will be back sometime after eleven pm. If Miss Lucette hasn’t woken back up please leave us a message and I’ll see she receives medical attention.” That was extremely courteous, you do your best to say thanks to the generous offer.

With that he stands back up, retrieves Eva, she waves and they walk out the door. Leaving you trapped in her room, but more importantly trapped in the cage still. You forgot to ask them to let you out. With nothing better to do, you try the key in the lock again. Maybe in a calmer place it will work this time. It doesn’t. You shake the cage door violently for a moment and decide just to wait. Lucette is gonna let you out, you will relax for a bit, then you can go back to the pound and resume your plan of getting out of this nightmare. Feeling safe around her you unwind the fabric covering you and lay down on it. The room was dark, cool and critically, safe. It’s a perfect place for a nap, and instantly sleep comes to visit you.
111111121222112211212.title: Both of you are saved

choices: After some further relaxing and recovery it becomes time to return to the shop
Knocking on the door interrupts the peaceful moment
1111111212221122112122.content:
Polite repetitive knocking rattles through the door to Lucette’s room and into your sleeping fantasies. It continues with muffled sounds, unending and eternal they slowly become clearer. “Room service for Lucette Winspear, room service.” Thumping and feline squeak drift into your sleep and gently wake you up. For a few moments reality is surreal and you confuse your dreamscape and reality. Eventually it sets back in, like falling down into a pit. The cage is still all around you, the room is still massive, and you are naked but still comfortable and safe. Lucette might be awake, memories are not exactly reliable when mixed with dream soup. With any luck she will be here in a moment.

Her voice pierces the dark, “Shannon? Where are you Shannon?” FINALLY! Time to get out of this cage, “I’m in the main room Lucette!” Her footfalls quickened and did the concern in her voice “Shannon? Shannon Larrity? Are you here?” Again you reply, but she didn’t hear you. Finally she comes hastily out to the room and finds the cage and the woman inside standing and waving to her. “Oh thank goodness, there you are Shannon. Lets get you out of there right now. I am so sorry.” Lucette approaches topless, the remains of her dress hanging around her hips. Quickly you hold the key out for her and she takes it, all but tearing open the door for you to leave. Instantly you do just that feeling far better about the entire situation. “I woke up and realized I didn’t know how I got back or what happened to you. I feared the worst.”

By the time you exit she has already walked to the door. Either uncaring about the state of her attire or oblivious. She opened the door and a warm light permeated the dim room. A racoon teenage boy or maybe young man stood in the hallway with a cart that had a dome covered plate on it, “I have your Savannah Steak Miss….” He trailed off mid-sentence clearly distracted by Lucette’s undress. She looked at him waiting for him to wheel the cart inside and with a grunt of disapproval covered herself as best she could with one hand and with the other pulled the cart inside with the other. He snapped back to attention red faced, or would have been red faced, under the fur. Lucette’s annoyance was on the surface and even from behind you could read it. He stuck his hand out expecting a tip, he must be new, her body language was not of someone feeling generous. Her hands dropped to her legs and only her wrists moved in an agitated staccato manner pulled her dress the rest of the way off. A quick flip of one of her legs kicked the dress into the hand not holding the door and she struck a pose for a moment. The boy’s bewilderment could probably have been seen from the other side of the ocean kissing the side of the resort. Mid bewilderment the dress holding arm became the only source of motion as she threw the ruined red dress into his face and shut the door before he could remove it.

The naked cheetah was far more energetic now, and coordinated, probably having slept off the worst of her hangover. She picked you up and hugged you. Being smushed between another pair of breasts, still not a welcome feel. But wasn’t cold and scaly like the last set. She released you onto the couch and wheeled the cart over. The couch is tough to walk on but you manage a few steps back so you can more easily communicate with her. “You are looking a lot better, did you have a good nap?” She smiled in relief at you, “OMG, so much better. So before we talk about anything else, what the hell happened? Last thing I remember is yelling at the people behind the front desk.”

You recap few minutes following her tail getting shut in the cage to Mr. Bowman returning the both of you here. Following the tale Lucette seems to be more grateful for you sticking your neck out than she was concerned about having passed out in the elevator. She must party hard to be accustomed to it?

She removes the dome of the plate and begins to work with some utensils you cannot see., “Well at least I didn’t ruin my dress for once. Bastard teenagers. I’m gonna need another shower, fucking perverts.” Hunger hits you like an avalanche, it just no occurs to you that you have not eaten since the pound? Did they feed you? No they did not. How did you manage to survive almost three days with no food and not notice? “You are all kinds of alright little hum---I mean Shannon. Thank you, I really appreciate what you did for me today.” Momentarily one of these giant furs being appreciative catches you off guard, “You are welcome. We can’t just let someone walk all over us right? Besides, when I went for nights out with the girls we never left one behind.” She stopped with the utensils and leaned over the cart, “I think you would be fun to have a night out with.” That was an unexpected comment of camaraderie, “Wow, um thank you, but I think I need to get, ya know back to normal before I go out for drinks.” She leaned back and went back to the dinner, “What? Oh tonight? No no no no. We gotta get you back to your normal height and get those things off of you. Then I can introduce you to my friends and we can go dancing or something.” Looks like you have made a friend. “Yes, think that sounds like a ball.” She leaned back over the cart at you, offering a small plate, probably an unused coaster for a drink, covered steak cut to small pieces and the accompanying sides.

Looks like you have made a friend that views you as a peer here. Well you are stuck tiny but it’s good to know that even if nobody else does, Lucette has your back. Internally emotions threaten to break out of your control but will power molds them back into enjoyable quantities and shapes. She rounds the cart and lays down naked behind you on the couch, which is a little uncomfortable for you. She flips the TV on and places her plate on her stomach, “You don’t mind if I watch racing do you? It always seems to be on when I’m getting through a hangover, it’s almost tradition at this point.” With all the tires and engines’ noises that seems like the opposite of what anybody would need but to each their own. Your mouth has a golf ball sized bite of steak in it so a thumbs up is the best approval you can offer. Far above you on the couch she pauses mid first bite of steak seeing you have to use your hands. Once the meat was in her mouth she pulled out the fork and casually tosses the fork on to the floor and enjoys the rest of the meal with her fingers. A few minutes into your meal a spotted fingers wrap themselves around your waist and slides you back against her thigh, at first you are uncomfortable being pressed against another naked woman, but after placing you there she resumes eating without a word or a look. It was far superior to sitting on the edge of falling off. You relax against her leg and eat the rest of your meal as content as you have been since arriving here.

Your cock raged at the helpless ness of your situation if you could be trapped here for a long time, does it hate you? The fox reaches for a guy who looks uncomfortably like you, “Terrance, you have been here for about six months, lets get rid of you!” Indifferently she unlocks his cage, puts the cage on top Jane’s cage and drops him into the glass box. “Kim, five months for you, in the box you go.” She repeated the process. She selected people smaller and smaller, starting at a foot and going down. After about a dozen shrunken people were in the box she pulled another miniature human from the shelf, “Oof, you’ve been here a long time miss….Summers? Like two years in that thing. I bet you are eager to get out even if it’s to go in the box. Lets get you outta there.” She twisted the key in the lock but it wouldn’t budge. The woman inside was clearly conflicted about this, the fox was not. “Oh well, I tried.” She dropped the cage with the six inch tall woman into the trash and picked up the next one. This was NOT the fun fetish experiment you came here for! Maybe that cheetah can help you, if you find him again and can get his attention. Maybe not? Her mouth pointed upward and opened, he fell into it and was swallowed whole! Was this something you missed when you read the brochure and reviews of this place? You did NOT sign up to be eaten!

She closed and locked the container and wheeled the cart toward the front. From the back of the container the logo for “Bethany’s ‘Bitty BBQ, the finest at the resort” was clearly visible.
